body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Ronald Lopez. How can I assist you today?

Hi! I'm really excited to learn more about your programs. My name is Diana Scott.

Nice to meet you, Diana! Before we get started, for our records, could you provide your email address?

Sure! My email is diana.scott@email.com.

Thank you, Diana. And could I also have your phone number, just in case we need to reach you?

Definitely! My phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Great, thank you. We take privacy very seriously here at Harmony Music School, so I want to assure you that your information is kept safe and used only for communication regarding our programs.

I appreciate that Ronald! It's reassuring to know my information is safe.

Absolutely, Diana. If there's anything else you need or want to explore about our music classes, feel free to ask.

I'll definitely reach out if I have more questions. Thanks for your help!

You're welcome, Diana. Thank you for your time and have a musical day!
